The Touch

25 Jul 2017 The touch

The touch

Last time I was all in with all my emotions within My hand held tight and I don’t know if it was right.

Last time I was all in 
with all my emotions within 
My hand held tight 
and I don’t know if it was right.

Like a river

27 May 2017 Like a river

Like a river I flow through the night and dark Sometimes gushing, Sometimes calm leaving its mark

Like a river I flow
through the night and dark
Sometimes gushing, Sometimes calm
leaving its mark

This beautiful girl has got SCARS!

27 Feb 2017 This beautiful girl has got SCARS!

This beautiful girl has got SCARS!

She came into this world People adored. Look at her, She has no flaws She crawls.

She came into this world
People adored.
Look at her,
She has no flaws
She crawls.

Me — Carnivore to Herbivore

22 Jan 2017 Me — Carnivore to Herbivore

Me — Carnivore to Herbivore

I was born vegetarian. You must be wondering what is “Born Vegetarian”. May be you have already guessed by now. Indians are diverse in many…




I was born vegetarian. You must be wondering what is “Born Vegetarian”.
May be you have already guessed by now. Indians are diverse in many aspects, one being casteism. So I am a Brahmin, which makes me a vegetarian by birth. As brahmins, we should abstain from non vegetarian diet. 
Oh Wait ! There are exceptions too. A pahadi brahmin(brahmin who belongs to hills)has the liberty to break this rule. I don’t just say this, but I know many people who believe this. The reason is so obvious, its so freaking cold….. in the hills?
Read More...

I am Dark

19 Jan 2017 I am DARK

I am DARK

You touch me I tremble Not with excitement, but with fear. I am DARK within, Oh! don’t come near.

You touch me 
I tremble
Not with excitement, but with fear.
I am DARK within,
Oh! don’t come near.
